<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graveroot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3336)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=635" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 293 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 249 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The opaque white sap from the graveroot shrub clouds the mind. 

**Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d8 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d10 poison damage and [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94) 1 (1 round); Stage 3 2d6 poison damage and stupefied 2 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
